thread.section_title: Science News and Analysis - Wall Street Journal
thread.title: Energy Stocks Finally Catch Up to Crude Rally

author: Jon Sindreu
title: Energy Stocks Finally Catch Up to Crude Rally
text:
Energy stocks are finally catching up to the rally in crude pricesâ€”a sign that investors are increasingly positive about the long-term prospects of oil companies.
Accelerating global growth has increased demand for commodities, drawing down oil inventories and helping push oil prices to three-year highs. Meanwhile, a rout in the oil market from over $100 a barrel to under $30 led to extensive cost-cutting by producers, meaning they can now make more money at lower prices, investors say.
